title: Project ARMS
alternative_title: ARMS, プロジェクトアームズ
description: When in kindergarten a boy gets involved in an accident that is horrible damaging his arm. Somehow the doctors manage to save it. Now, several years later, his arm seems to become the focus of strange events, as it turns out that it's more than just a normal arm. Because of that a secret organization is out to get hold of him and the power he possesses.
